name: Movem
overview: A puzzle game based on Sokoban levels. It has great music, smooth scrolling, supports passwords for each level and has a level editor. published in Amiga Fun (UK) no. 6, Apr 1991, Amiga Mania no. 3, Jun 1992 and in Amiga Fun Gold Edition (DE) no. 2, 1993. A collision of the space vessel Vega VII with an asteroid rips tertium containers filled with plasma away from its anchors. The plasma containers must be fastened down again with the help of a droid, which you control! All containers must be pushed to an anchor. A control lamp on top of the container indicates when it is secure. The level finishes when all the containers are correctly secure. Do it in as few moves as possible.
